In this novel, the world is ruled by a powerful corporation called Vortex Games, which has created a video game so immersive and addictive that it has transformed into a real-world conflict simulator. The protagonist, Sam, is a teenager who discovers that she can see the virtual world of the game as it intersects with reality. As she navigates this new reality, she uncovers a conspiracy that threatens to plunge the world into chaos.

This novel explores themes of addiction, the power of technology, and the impact of virtual realities on human society, all while following the journey of a relatable protagonist named Sam. It's a fast-paced, thought-provoking read that should fit well with your interests.
